subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams retired with a left knee injury after one set and Justine Henin advanced to the semifinals at the Sony Ericsson Championships in Madrid. Henin beat Jelena Jankovic, 6-2, 6-2, at the season-ending tournament. Williams retired after losing the first set by 6-4 to the seventh-ranked Anna Chakvetadze.
